q: Success is like reaching an important birthday and finding you're exactly the same.
h:
“Success is like reaching an important birthday and finding you're exactly the same.” —
Audrey Hepburn

q: Not everything that weighs you down is yours to carry.
h:
“Not everything that weighs you down is yours to carry.” —
Unknown

q: The universe doesn't give you what you ask for with your thoughts - it gives you what you demand with your actions.
h:
“The universe doesn't give you what you ask for with your thoughts - it gives you what you demand with your actions.” —
Steve Maraboli

q: Keep your eyes on the stars, but remember to keep your feet on the ground.
h:
“Keep your eyes on the stars, but remember to keep your feet on the ground.” —
Theodore Roosevelt
